review.reviewBody: Some ppl have commented on portion sizes... I thought they were reasonable and standard compared to elsewhere. Quality and taste was amazing tho! Definitely recommend.
You can close your eyes and order anything off this menu, it will be insanely good.
I definitely have noticed shrinkflation in the portion sizes going down while prices going up.  Coconut rice was really dry and the naan not very flavourful.  Main dishes tasted great though.
The Dal Makhani and the Channa Masala (DF, GF) were delicious and turned up hot. Excellent quality and. Taste. I will order again it' s going to be a favourite.
Food Itself was lovely as ever but the naan seemed smaller than usual and the tub of butter chicken wasnt full.
